description: Try our easy to follow Pea Dip With Crispy Falafel recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Falafel,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Dec 2019,Summer,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Pea Dip With Crispy Falafel Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup mint (plus extra leaves to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Place falafel onto tray, spray with oil and bake for 5-8 minutes or until crisp.
Meanwhile, process peas, sour cream and mint in a food processor to a rough paste. Season and transfer to serving plates.
Slice half the radishes. Serve pea dip with falafel (halved, if desired), radish, extra mint leaves, a drizzle of oil and lemon wedges.
